sentence: Hours after the Biden administration announced measures to make “ghost guns” — home-assembled firearms without serial numbers — harder for felons to access, Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro told media he was prepared to handle legal challenges to the ruling.
author: Jesse Bunch
title: AG Josh Shapiro says he'll fight challenges to Biden's crackdown on ghost guns

sentence: Wolf’s term as governor will end this year due to term limits, but his Attorney General, Democrat Josh Shapiro, will happily step into the role of a dictator if elected in November.
author: For Medianews Group
title: Letter to the Editor: Gov. Wolf ignores Pa. constitution again
